verses.verse: <S%H1945>Woe<s%> to those who <S%H2803>devise<s%> <S%H205>iniquity<s%> and <S%H6466>work<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> on their <S%H4904>beds!<s%> When the <S%H1242>morning<s%> is <S%H216>light,<s%> they <S%H6213>practice<s%> <S%H3426>it,<s%> because it is in the <S%H410>power<s%> of their <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

They <S%H2530>covet<s%> <S%H7704>fields,<s%> and <S%H1497>seize<s%> <S%H1004>them;<s%> and houses, and take them <S%H5375>away:<s%> and they <S%H6231>oppress<s%> a <S%H1397>man<s%> and his <S%H1004>house,<s%> even a <S%H376>man<s%> and his <S%H5159>heritage.<s%>

Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H2803>"Behold,<s%> I am planning against these <S%H4940>people<s%> a <S%H7451>disaster,<s%> from which you will not <S%H4185>remove<s%> your <S%H6677>necks,<s%> neither will you <S%H3212>walk<s%> <S%H7317>haughtily;<s%> for it is an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H6256>time.<s%>

In that <S%H3117>day<s%> they will take <S%H5375>up<s%> a <S%H4912>parable<s%> against <S%H5091>you,<s%> and lament with a <S%H5093>doleful<s%> <S%H5092>lamentation,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H7703><s%> 'We are utterly <S%H7703>ruined!<s%> My <S%H5971>people<s%>'s <S%H2506>possession<s%> is <S%H4171>divided<s%> <S%H4185>up.<s%> Indeed he takes it from me and <S%H2505>assigns<s%> our <S%H7704>fields<s%> to <S%H7725>traitors!<s%>'"
Therefore you will have no one who <S%H7993>divides<s%> the <S%H2256>land<s%> by <S%H1486>lot<s%> in the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
<S%H5197>"Don't<s%> prophesy!" They <S%H5197>prophesy.<s%> <S%H5197>"Don't<s%> prophesy about these <S%H3639>things.<s%> Disgrace <S%H5253>won't<s%> overtake us."

Shall it be <S%H559>said,<s%> O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob:<s%> "Is the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7114>angry?<s%> Are these his <S%H4611>doings?<s%> <S%H1697>Don't<s%> my words do <S%H3190>good<s%> to him who <S%H1980>walks<s%> <S%H3477>blamelessly?<s%>"

But <S%H865>lately<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> have risen <S%H6965>up<s%> as an <S%H341>enemy.<s%> You <S%H6584>strip<s%> the <S%H145>robe<s%> <S%H4136>and<s%> <S%H8008>clothing<s%> from those who <S%H5674>pass<s%> by without a <S%H983>care,<s%> <S%H7725>returning<s%> from <S%H4421>battle.<s%>

You drive the <S%H802>women<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1644>out<s%> from their <S%H8588>pleasant<s%> <S%H1004>houses;<s%> from their young <S%H5768>children<s%> you take <S%H3947>away<s%> my <S%H1926>blessing<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>

<S%H6965>Arise,<s%> and <S%H3212>depart!<s%> For this is not your <S%H4496>resting<s%> <S%H2930>place,<s%> because of uncleanness that <S%H2254>destroys,<s%> even with a <S%H4834>grievous<s%> <S%H2256>destruction.<s%>

<S%H3863>If<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1980>walking<s%> in a <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H8267>falsehood<s%> <S%H3576>lies:<s%> "I will <S%H5197>prophesy<s%> to you of <S%H3196>wine<s%> and of strong <S%H7941>drink;<s%>" he would be the <S%H5197>prophet<s%> of this <S%H5971>people.<s%>

I will <S%H622>surely<s%> <S%H622>assemble,<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> all of <S%H6908>you;<s%> I will surely <S%H6908>gather<s%> the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> I will <S%H7760>put<s%> them <S%H3162>together<s%> as the <S%H6629>sheep<s%> of <S%H1223>Bozrah,<s%> as a <S%H5739>flock<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of their <S%H1699>pasture;<s%> they will <S%H1949>swarm<s%> with <S%H120>people.<s%>

He who <S%H6555>breaks<s%> open the way goes <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6555>them.<s%> They break <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> and go <S%H3318>out.<s%> And their <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5674>passes<s%> on <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>them,<s%> with Yahweh at their <S%H7218>head.<s%>
